text:
Question 136) A running team mechanic needs the following measures in a car to be obtained in meters: a) distance between the front and rear axles; b) height b between the ground and the pilot's backrest.
When choosing measurements A and B in meters, respectively, respectively, obtain
A) 0.23 and 0.16.
B) 2.3 and 1.6.
C) 23 and 16.
D) 230 and 160.
E) 2 300 and 1 600.
